message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value for you at $1200000. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. I propose to sell this product to you at a special price of $1150000. This offer is designed to ensure you receive unparalleled value while also maximizing my earnings. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this opportunity.
